sources.title: Hold 'em Yale (1935)
sources.description: Hold 'em Yale Cesar Romero, Buster Crabbe 1935

metadata.Plot: A pretty young socialite falls for a charming but shady hustler, who abandons her when he finds that she has been disowned by her wealthy father. Three of the hustler's partners, who have also been left high and dry by heir former associate, come up with a plan to get her to the annual Yale-Harvard football game to reunite with her former sweetheart, an honest but nerdy bookworm.
metadata.Writer: Damon Runyon, Paul Gerard Smith, Eddie Welch
metadata.Actors: Patricia Ellis, Cesar Romero, Buster Crabbe
